
# Learning Solidity in 2022

Hello I am Udit and I have just started learning about blockchain, so I am learning solidity to develop smart contract. I am making this repo to maintain my code and track my progress on learning solidity. I also post some projects about smart contract when I wil finish learning basics of solidity.
